title: Discount:1888 Yum Yums for Sale or Trade
author: oldjudge

posts.post_title: Discount:1888 Yum Yums for Sale or Trade
posts.post_content:
Two incredibly rare 1888 portrait Yum Yums available. Yum Yums come in two varieties, line drawings, and the more desirable portraits. These two are of the latter type. The Richardson is available for $2500 while the Flint is available for $3500. Please email me at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url] if interested or for better images.

Thanks—Jay
